Judul: Human activities and nitrogen in waters
Abstrak:
It is to review the sources and contributions of anthropogenic nitrogen into water bodies, to summary the
relationships between nitrogen concentrations in water bodies and human factors, and to highlight the
general trends of the nitrogen levels in different times.
Kontributor / Dosen Pembimbing: Sun Dong-Bao, Hao Wei-Ping, Li Yu-Zhong, Mei Xu-Rong, Zhang Yan-Qing
Kata Kunci: Anthropogenic nitrogen sources Factors, influenced nitrogen concentrations,in waters, Trends in the nitrogen concentrations
